nl.idfocus.nam.util

Class Base32

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.idfocus.nam.util.Base32

  • public class Base32
extends java.lang.Object
    Encodes arbitrary byte arrays as case-insensitive base-32 strings
    Author:
    sweis@google.com (Steve Weis), Neal Gafter
